pageContext.claim: “Remember years ago, every story, every night, the nightly news, you'd always have horrible stories about the VA. You don't see it anymore.”
pageContext.analysis: There continue to be reports of veterans being abused and facing long wait times for treatment. For instance, in 2019, there were news stories about 11 suspicious deaths at a VA Medical Center, a VA pathologist who misdiagnosed 3,000 cases and wasn't fired until 2018, a VA physician who allegedly sexually assaulted more than a dozen patients, and how a veteran at a VA facility was allegedly bitten by ants 100 times before his death.
